title: Gambling Week: Division Winners plus Make/Miss Playoffs Best Bets with Larry Hartstein (Football 9/1)
description:
Gambling Week continues with Larry Hartstein of SportsLine. Larry links up with host Will Brinson to deliver his value picks for all 8 divisions (5:00). Even though he's picking all 8, doesn't mean you should bet all 8. Listen to find out where there is value. Then, we hear some make/miss playoff bets (22:15) and a near fool-proof Week 1 gambling system that has a track record of nearly two decades of success (26:00).
Sign up for SportsLine today and use promo code "Bell" for your first month at just $1!
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @LarryHartstein
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
